manimorph.stack: Next.js, Typescript, Docker, AI SDK, FastAPI

ftp-server.description: File Transfer Protocol Server written in C

pastty.description: Drop videos in tweets like magic

getsetgo.description: A simple redis clone built in go, compatible with resp-protocol

Journey of a request — Beyond the Protoc.description: Have you ever thought about what goes behind the scenes when you make a request on the internet?

How LinkedIn finds your friends in Real.description: Ever wondered how Linkedin instantly knows if someone’s your 2nd or 3rd connection, in a graph with millions of members and billions of connections?

WebSockets 101 — Rolling your own Websoc.description: Deep Dive into working of the websocket protocol, understanding the need, pros, cons and functionality of them, with a hands on tutorial on building your own websocket server from scratch

TCP Congestion Control.description: Why does your internet randomly slow down, then speed back up? That’s not bad WiFi—it’s TCP congestion control at work.
